title: Isolation Forest (iForest)
authors: Fei Tony Liu and Kai Ming Ting and Zhi-Hua Zhou

parameters.name: n_trees
parameters.description: The number of decision trees (base estimators) in the forest (ensemble).

parameters.name: max_samples
parameters.description: The number of samples to draw from X to train each base estimator: `max_samples * X.shape[0]`. If unspecified (`null`), then `max_samples=min(256, n_samples)`.

parameters.name: max_features
parameters.description: The number of features to draw from X to train each base estimator: `max_features * X.shape[1]`.

parameters.name: bootstrap
parameters.description: If True, individual trees are fit on random subsets of the training data sampled with replacement. If False, sampling without replacement is performed.

parameters.name: verbose
parameters.description: Controls the verbosity of the tree building process logs.

parameters.name: n_jobs
parameters.description: The number of jobs to run in parallel. If -1, then the number of jobs is set to the number of cores.
